original_title: Great Irish Drinks: The History of Irish Breweries & Distilleries
overview: Takes a tour of the best this Ireland has to offer, sharing history, culture, tradition and the flavors of all the classic Irish brews. From Guinness to the magical whiskey distilleries, you'll get to see exactly how it's done.
title: Great Irish Drinks: The History of Irish Breweries & Distilleries
